description: // A certified organic linen from our exclusive colour range in Lilac. This plain weave fabric has a lovely earthy feel, with subtle, naturally occurring slubs and tufts throughout. A bouncy midweight linen, with a smooth aero-finish and beautiful depth of colour. This semi-transparent fabric has a very subtle lustre and no stretch, starting off crisp but softening beautifully over time. A wonderfully versatile weight at 160gsm, suitable for everything from shirts, shorts, dresses and skirts to all manner of homewares and accessories.

// A classic plain weave linen in Dusky Orchid, part of our Exclusive Linen Range milled just for us. This heavyweight fabric has a lovely earthy feel, with subtle, naturally occurring slubs throughout. A great heavier weight alternative to our lighter milled linen range. Perfect for jackets, pants and skirts or homeware projects such as aprons, tea towels, cushions and soft furnishings.

// A super fun gingham linen in Dusky Orchid from our Exclusive Colour Range. This lightweight fabric is made from European Flax certified yarn creating a lovely earthy feel, with subtle, naturally occurring slubs throughout. The yarn-dyed pattern is made up of a white and dusky orchid purple striped warp and weft which combine to create a gingham style rectangular check, individual rectangles measure 8 by 11mm. This non-stretch fabric is great for a wide variety of projects including tops, dresses, loose-fitting skirts, shorts, trousers & jumpsuits as well as some lightweight soft furnishings. #tfsginghamlinen

This semi-transparent fabric has a very subtle lustre and no stretch, starting off crisp but softening beautifully over time. A wonderfully versatile weight at 160gsm, suitable for everything from shirts, shorts, dresses and skirts to all manner of homewares and accessories.

// A crinkle linen in Vintage Blush from our Exclusive Colour Range. This lightweight plain weave linen is woven with European Flax ™ certified fibre and has the most delightful gauzy textural finish. The fabric has been woven using a special high twist yarn that naturally crinkles when put through its final water wash creating a semi-opaque fabric with incredible movement and great drape. A pure linen in a slightly open weave with a lovely earthy feel and subtle, naturally occurring slubs throughout. This non-stretch, textural fabric is perfect for loose-fitting lined dresses and skirts, breezy tops, wraps and loungewear. Please note, natural variation in texture may vary across the fabric.
